highlights.description: New Cobra CLI for interacting with Aha! API from the command line
Comprehensive idea-feature-release reporting with multiple output formats

added.description: CLI: Cobra CLI with commands for ideas, features, products, releases, and reports
CLI: `--inflate` flag to fetch full idea details including categories
CLI: `--fail-on-error` flag for strict feature fetch error handling
CLI: Progress bar during idea inflation
SDK: `IdeaFeatureReport` and `IdeaFeatureReportSet` for comprehensive idea-feature-release reporting
SDK: `GetIdeaFeatureReports()` with automatic pagination via `FetchAll` option

fixed.description: `CustomField.Value` now supports any type (string, array, etc.) matching actual Aha! API responses
`Idea` model fields (`categories`, `votes`, timestamps) are now optional to handle varying API responses

documentation.description: MkDocs documentation site with Getting Started, CLI Reference, SDK Guide, and Examples
README updated with quick start, API reference table, and corrected examples
